Hip Fractures: Working on standardizing care pathway across the care continuum, including engaging PAC partners in driving quality and outcomes. Initial meetings with PAC partners have taken place (3 meetings x 2 partners) to launch into this work. Hip Fracture care pathway mapping and redesign project has launched. Hip Fracture care pathway updates are a standard item on our multidisciplinary team monthly meeting and we are engaging hospitalist/medicine partners in standardization and efficiency opportunities, including (not limited to) approach to endocrinology follow up, PT/OT protocols, and medication management.Shoulders: Working on standardizing care pathway across the care continuum. Engaging shoulder teams in developing consistent pre-op patient education and optimization pathway. Reviewing outliers for opportunities for improvement.
Challenges: Limited HHA access in our region and no affiliated HHA as part of our system. Limited control over PAC setting other than driving improvement through partnerships.
